text:
Howard David is a longtime sportscaster. He was most recently with the NFL on Westwood One until 2012. He called NBA games for the New Jersey Nets, Milwaukee Bucks, and the Boston Celtics. David called NFL games for the New York Jets and the Miami Dolphins. He called football and basketball for the New York Cosmos and the Princeton Tigers. He called college bowling, college football and college basketball for Mizlou Television. For CBS Radio, he called play-by-play for the NFL on CBS Radio and MLB on CBS Radio. He replaced Jack Buck as lead play-by-play for the NFL on Westwood One until 2002. David returned to Westwood One until 2012. David also called NBA games for ESPN Radio. He is the play-by-play announcer for the UFL on CBS Sports Network and was the play-by-play voice for the NFL on Sports USA.
David calls play-by-play for the United Football League on the CBS Sports Network. He also called two games for MLB on Fox during the 2013 MLB season.
